item.description:
Join Members and Guests of the SSDOMG for a mid-month Saturday afternoon at a restaurant that is very new to the SSDOMG: Villa Rosa in Quincy. Yes, despite the very close votes in which 4 restaurants were all within 2 votes of each other, the Organizer Team decided to veer into Quincy near the Milton line as we have not yet been to that section of Quincy and we wanted to try a different area of the map. The Italian/American menu looks very yummy and inexpensive with most lunch items under $11. The prices and generous portions are very appealing to the budget and cost conscious members of the SSDOMG. Why not join us for this event?

This will be a great opportunity to meet and get to know each other, as well as talk about different foods, restaurants, and meals we enjoy. This will also be a great time to plan our next Dining Out event.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Saturday Afternoon Mid-Month Lunch
Saturday, May 15th, 2010 @ 1pm
Villa Rosa Restaurant and Lounge
705 Adams Street
Quincy, MA 02169
617-773-0095
www.villarosaquincy.com

Meeting Location: Outside the front door if it's nice out. We will then go in together as a Group. Otherwise, inside the Lobby. If you arrive after we are seated the reservation is under "Angela."

Event Organizer(s): Angela and Alison

Min/Max: Min of 6 people by 7pm on Wednesday, May 12th. Max of 12 people.

Guests: 1 per Member

Fees: Annual Members & 1 Guest- FREE, Group Members - $2, Guests - $2

RSVP Deadline: 8pm on Friday, May 14th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer and will be considered a No-Show per our guidelines on the About Us page.

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over three years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

Inclement Weather: TBD - Please see our Weather policy on the About page (scroll to the bottom and click on "Weather").

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Please see the restaurant's website for best directions for you.

Overview: Near East Milton Square off Route 93.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the Front Door. Late arrivals should ask the host for "Angela."

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday Afternoon Mid-Month Lunch
